name: Police Escape - 3D Sniper
description:
Ex LYPD is caught by deadly underworld mafia and demanding to release their group of dangerous prisoners. Retired cop wants to break the jail but he requires your help for prison escape.

You are hired in US troop for specific purpose and that is to release the cop. Mission is tough and very dangerous. There are 25 levels you need to cross for releasing the cop.

Enemies are willing to shoot whoever tries to save the cop so you need to be on your toes and make sure cop returns alive.
